      • getIndex

        public int getIndex​()
        Description copied from interface: ISpecies
        Returns the index for this ISpecies, within the context of an Simulation. The index is the ISpecies' position in the array returned by SpeciesManager.getSpecies().
        Specified by:
        getIndex in interface ISpecies

        public void setIndex​(int newIndex)
        Description copied from interface: ISpecies
        Informs the ISpecies what its index should be. This should only be called by the SpeciesManager.

      • isDynamic

        public boolean isDynamic​()
        Description copied from interface: ISpecies
        Returns whether the Species is dynamic. If a Species is dynamic and has oriented molecules, then the molecules will have a velocity component. If a Species is dynamic and is not oriented, its atoms will have a velocity component.
        Specified by:
        isDynamic in interface ISpecies
        Returns:
        whether the Species is dynamic

      • getSpace

        public Space getSpace​()
        Specified by:
        getSpace in interface ISpecies
        Returns:
        the Space of the Species. This is the Space that molecules and atoms are constructed with.

      • initializeConformation

        public void initializeConformation​(IMolecule molecule)
        Description copied from interface: ISpecies

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        name - String matching the name for the AtomType.
        number - The nth atom with that type to get, starting at 1.
